front.title: Leaf discovery mechanism for mLDP based P2MP/MP2MP LSP

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism for an mLDP based P2MP/MP2MP LSP root node to discover the leaf nodes information. This allows the root node gets the full information of the leaf node for one specified P2MP/MP2MP LSP. Such kind of function provides a general method for mLDP based P2MP/MP2MP LSP leaf node discovery, which will be used for multiplexing/aggregation by various mLDP applications, e.g, P2MP PW [I-D.draft-martini-pwe3-p2mp-pw], VPLS multicast [I-D.draft-ietf-l2vpn-vpls-mcast], L3VPN multicast [I-D.draft-ietf-l3vpn-2547bis-mcast] and etc.
